name: VanDrie Group
goal: The Dutch family business VanDrie Group is the global market leader in veal, calf leather and calf milk replacer. VanDrie Group is the largest private agribusiness in the Netherlands  with more than 25 companies and an annual turnover of approximately ?2 billion. It exports its high-quality products to more than 60 countries around the world.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Food Safety
